text.*:
Mangas
Native to Nigeria
Region Bauchi State
Native speakers
 100 (1995)[1]
Language family
Afro-Asiatic
  • Chadic
    • West Chadic
      • Barawa (B.3)
        • Boghom
          • Mangas
Language codes
ISO 639-3 zns
Glottolog mang1416[2]

Mangas is an endangered Afro-Asiatic language spoken in Mangas town in Bauchi State, Nigeria.[1]

Notes[edit]

  1. ^ a b Mangas at Ethnologue (18th ed., 2015)
  2. ^ Hammarström, Harald; Forkel, Robert; Haspelmath, Martin, eds. (2017). "Mangas". Glottolog 3.0. Jena, Germany: Max Planck Institute for the Science of Human History.
